cause.description:
No disrespect to the Star Spangled Banner, but Freebird definitely represents America way better. Freebird embodies the American Dream like no other song does...Come on, you know what the right thing to do is...PLAY FREEBIRD!!!
1. America=Freebird
cause.mission: Change the National Anthem to Freebird
cause.name: Change the National Anthem to Freebird
